answers.author: Jacob Foos
answers.text:
That's a great topic for discussion.  Our town just started using Google Apps for the email and calendar features and it would be good to know more about how best to utilize the other features.

author: Julie Butler
text: I'm looking for an ICMA member to serve as a presenter on the topic of Best Government Practices with Google Apps at the ICMA Annual Conference in Charlotte.  If you or another member you know is interested, please email me at jbutler@icma.org.  Thank you!
title: Best Government Practices with Google Apps?
